Introduction

Sung Yeol is a South Korean singer and actor under Management 2sang. He is a member of the boy group INFINITE and its sub-unit, INFINITE F. He made his acting debut in 2011 with the drama While You Were Sleeping.

He debuted as a member of INFINITE on June 9, 2010, with the release of their mini album First Invasion. Over the years, he actively participated in group activities while also expanding his career into acting.

On March 31, 2021, Woollim Entertainment announced that Sung Yeol, along with fellow member Dong Woo, had left the agency following the expiration of their contracts. A few months later, on June 7, it was confirmed that he had signed with Management 2sang.

Regarding his personal life, Sung Yeol enlisted for his mandatory military service on March 26, 2019, as an active duty soldier in the 37th Division. His initial discharge date was set for October 27, 2020, but due to military policies aimed at preventing the spread of COVID-19, he was discharged early on October 4, 2020, without returning to his post.
